CLUSTER_SUBSYSTEMS.label: Cluster subsystems
CLUSTER_SUBSYSTEMS.help: Draw and label each subsystem separately.

SHOW_EXCHANGES.label: Show exchanges
SHOW_EXCHANGES.help: Draw transport and exchange reactions for each compartment.

COMPACT.label: Compact
COMPACT.help: Attempt to draw reactions more compactly.

SHOW_MINORS.label: Show minors
SHOW_MINORS.help: Include minor metabolites for each reaction.

CLUSTER_MINORS.label: Cluster minors
CLUSTER_MINORS.help: Try to keep minor metabolites close together in each reaction.

MAX_MINORS.label: Max minors
MAX_MINORS.help: Maximum number of minor metabolites drawn on each reaction.  Additional minors are listed, not drawn.

MINOR_MET_FRACTION.label: Minor metabolite fraction
MINOR_MET_FRACTION.help: Fraction of reactions that a metabolite must participate in to be considered minor by default.

CLONE_LEVEL.label: Clone level
CLONE_LEVEL.help: Major metabolites in a subsystem that participate in this many reactions will be cloned and drawn separately.

LINK_CLONES.label: Link clones
LINK_CLONES.help: Connect cloned metabolites with a line.

CLONE_LINK_ATTRS.label: Clone link attributes
CLONE_LINK_ATTRS.help: Graphviz parameters for drawing the lines between clones.

SUBSYSTEM_BORDER_STYLE.label: Subsystem border style
SUBSYSTEM_BORDER_STYLE.help: Graphviz style for drawing borders around subsystems.

MET_ATTRS.label: Metabolite attributes
MET_ATTRS.help: Graphviz parameters for drawing major metabolites.

MINOR_MET_ATTRS.label: Minor metabolite attributes
MINOR_MET_ATTRS.help: Graphviz parameters for drawing minor metabolites.

INVISIBLE_NODE_ATTRS.label: Invisible node attributes
INVISIBLE_NODE_ATTRS.help: Graphviz parameters for drawing hidden nodes.

METABOLITE_LABEL_TRANSFORM.label: Metabolite label transform
METABOLITE_LABEL_TRANSFORM.help: Python function applied to each metabolite ID to create the label text.  The default transformation leaves the name unchanged.

REACTION_LABEL_TRANSFORM.label: Reaction label transform
REACTION_LABEL_TRANSFORM.help: Python function applied to each reaction ID to create the label text.  The default transformation leaves the name unchanged.
